article_title: Santa Paws and Tickle Me Elmo
article_text: Yeah, the toy-of-the-year thing can create some ugly hysteria, but when deployed properly, Tickle Me Elmo and his ilk sure do seem to bring a lot of joy to kids. Thanks to Vickie Makings for supplying this photo.

article_summary:
Yeah, the toy-of-the-year thing can create some ugly hysteria, but when deployed properly, Tickle Me Elmo and his ilk sure do seem to bring a lot of joy to kids.
Thanks to Vickie Makings for supplying this photo.
